content.text: he heapSpace Value returned: a number equal to the amount of working memory HyperCard has left (the number of bytes remaining in HyperCard’s application heap) The memory that HyperCard can use is divided into two parts—the heap and the stack. StackSpace returns the amount of memory that’s available in the stack portion. HeapSpace returns the amount available in the heap portion.
